sentences.english: Indonesia's rupiah trillionaires have so much money that it's difficult to count it.
sentences.chinese: 印度尼西亞的億萬富豪錢多得都沒法準確計算了。

sentences.english: Mr. Hoogewerf said the actual number of dollar billionaires could be higher than estimated.
sentences.chinese: 胡潤說，實際的以美元衡量的億萬富豪比估計的要多。

sentences.english: For now, however, the billionaire yacht owners of the world will have to fight for parking spaces.
sentences.chinese: 然而眼下，全世界的億萬富豪船主們還是得爭搶泊位。

sentences.english: Gauteng is building on the top floor of this well-known billionaire's club is located.
sentences.chinese: 高騰大廈頂樓是這間著名的億萬富豪俱樂部所在地。

sentences.english: If I charge one dime of tuition per person, I can be a billionaire.
sentences.chinese: 我一人只收一角錢的學費，我就可以成爲億萬富豪。

sentences.english: Hong Kong billionaire Li Ka-shing's foundation is a major supporter of the Cheung Kong Graduate School of Business.
sentences.chinese: 香港億萬富豪李嘉誠基金是長江商學院的主要資助者。

sentences.english: "Billionaire Tycoon", which will go on sale this autumn, is one engaging example.
sentences.chinese: 今秋開賣的“億萬富豪”即爲明例。

definition: Schröder (name)/Gerhard Schröder (1944-), German SPD politician, Chancellor 1998-2005
token (used instead of money for slot machines, in game arcades etc)

pinyin: Ya4 zhou1 Kai1 fa1 Yin2 hang2
Guo2 ji4 Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4
